729370f-a.text:
(1)
1622 Richmond Road, at the S. E. corner of Liberty Avenue, showing the Egbert House. lIt was the house of Joseph Egbert, Congressman for one term, and County Clerk for one year in 1869. It is a Colonial dwelling. The view is north.
Yinter, 1925
P. L. Sperr
(2)
The same, looking south.
Winter, 1925
P. L. Sperr
(3)
The rear of the Echert House.
1924
P. L. Sperr
729370f-a.folder: Richmond Road & Liberty Avenue, Staten Island, NY
